channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C17 maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 28, 10:00 - 12:00 UTC

Mar 6, 23:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified rack.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/04/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in rack T06C17.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102B
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 22, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Mar 25, 22:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/04/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E102B will be temporarily unavailable during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating servers from rack E102B to rack E101D03.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [UK2][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 15, 14:00 - 15:00 UTC

Apr 9, 06:44 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 15/04/2025 14:00 UTC
End time : 15/04/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts:

Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation as we work to improve our platform and provide you with the best possible service.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack GRA0326A06B
item.description:
Apr 8, 18:59 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Dedicated Servers offering in GRA3, have been resolved
Start Time : 08/04/2025 17:12 UTC
End Time : 08/04/2025 18:59 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Apr 8, 18:24 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified, and our teams are currently implementing a fix.
We remind you that the impact is:
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack GRA0326A06B are no longer responding.
Root cause : Electrical disjunction.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible

We will continue to keep you up to date with developments and the resolution of the incident.

Apr 8, 17:58 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the GRA0326A06B.
Please find the details:
Start time : 08/04/2025 17:12 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack GRA0326A06B are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM/RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
Apr 3, 09:59 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 03/04/2025 09:40 UTC

Apr 3, 08:18 UTC
Update - This maintenance is taking longer than expected.
An update will be made when all operations have been completed.

We apologise for this inconvenience.

Apr 3, 04:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 19, 22:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 03/04/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 03/04/2025 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.
